metadata.title: CVE-2019-8813 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A logic issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue isfixed in iOS 13.2 and iPadOS 13.2, tvOS 13.2, Safari 13.0.3, iTunes forWindows 12.10.2, iCloud for Windows 11.0. Processing maliciously craftedweb content may lead to universal cross site scripting.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8813` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.26.2-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.26.2-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.26.2-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.26.2-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.26.2-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.26.2-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.26.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.26.2-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
